projects.title: FedEx Logo Redesign
projects.text_content:
The FedEx logo redesign has been modified to enhance the arrow better the E and X characters the company's brand. This project is still in building phase.


 -This project is still in building phase.

projects.title: Brency Card Design
projects.text_content:
Brency Card Design
This company is a fictional creation. During its design process, the use of multiple tools within "Figma" allowed me to develop a somewhat sleek/retro design. 

-This project is still in building phase.

projects.title: NOAA Rebuild
projects.text_content:
This redesign is going to allow its end users, to transition through the site with ease. The "SPC" redesign will allow its users to access the user's current location. This location provides you with added widgets that provide you with real time weather data statistic.

-This project is still in building phase.
